attributes.title: Video Editor
attributes.subTitle: Looking for a creative employee to work remotely
attributes.cardDescription: [RemotEmployees](/about) company looks for both novice and experienced video designers to work on international projects. English B1+ required. In the modern world, media content is believed to be a significant aspect of the promotion strategy of every business. Social media went viral, so video content is in great demand now. A Video editor is responsible for editing and video post-processing.
